title: LCD Colors Watchface
summary: LCD Interactive Watchface with different background colors, steps counter...
description: LCD Interactive Watchface with different background colors, steps counter, weather info, calendar events, phone and watch battery indicators, sunrise/sunset info.It works on both round and square watches.Note: If your phone runs Android 6.0 or greater you will have to grant the location access on your phone in order to have weather information by clicking on the notification it will show after using the watchface.
descriptionHTML:
LCD Interactive Watchface with different background colors, steps counter, weather info, calendar events, phone and watch battery indicators, sunrise/sunset info.

It works on both round and square watches.

Note: If your phone runs Android 6.0 or greater you will have to grant the location access on your phone in order to have weather information by clicking on the notification it will show after using the watchface.
comments: This is a really good watch face with the perfect amount of functionality. It took a few minutes more than other watch faces to show up in my list, but eventually it did.

Great looking watch face with lots of functionality This watch face looks great, however on my lg G watch R the p.m. symbol overlaps with the last digit of the time. Would be 5 stars if this was fixed! Edit: the pm issue was fixed in the last release so I'm updating my review to 5 stars.

Has everything I have been looking for in a Watch Face If you can't get it to show up try this:  using my Nexus 5 and Sony Smart Watch 3: -uninstall and reinstall Android wear on phone - uninstall and reinstall LCD Colors Watchface - on phone - go to settings -Â  app settings and permissions and allow calendar and location for LCD Colors Watchface
? Installed it, but I can't see it anywhere
Can't find it Paid for and downloaded it, but it doesn't show up on my phone or on my watch
Great looking watch face I really enjoy the way it looks, and the features it has are very useful
